document_data.name: Viper
document_data.mainbody: A '''viper''' was a common type of [[snake]] that varied greatly in size and appearance.
document_data.Behavior: Vipers were not especially aggressive, but would bite if they felt threatened before trying to slither away. They were solitary predators.
document_data.Combat: Vipers used their bites and venom to kill prey and defend themselves. This venom harmed a victim's health.
document_data.Uses: In [[1374 DR]], the [[Shadowscale]] [[lizardfolk]] placed captured small black vipers inside sealed [[clay]] pots, which they would then hurl as grenades at their foes. The hungry and angry snake would then attack the nearest living being, ignoring the undead Shadowscales. A snake of this kind could be spawned once per day by use of a costly ''[[viper dagger]]''.
document_data.Notable Vipers:
*[[Rexin]]: the viper ''[[familiar]]'' of [[Handragath]], a [[wizard]] member of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] ''circa'' [[1369 DR]].
*[[Shurrs]]: Cult of the Dragon slaver [[Bishimzon]]'s ''familiar'' in the 1369 DR.
*[[Teela]]: the [[animal companion]] of the the [[druid]] [[Kagha]] in the [[Emerald Grove]] ''circa'' [[1492 DR]].
